title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, steel
Technique: embroidered netting
description: Cream colored silk miser's purse with designs of flowers in cut steel beads.  Tassels are made from cut steel loops.  Single ring of steel, grooved ornament to fasten purse.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, steel
Technique: embroidered netting. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1951-105-21.
